text: 7.42 2 Sml 7.12, Sng 89.3-4, 132.11, Jer 23.5, Mai 5.2, Mat 2.5-6, Luk 2.4 God takaw ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agɨl anɨb agak, Bɨ God nop aglup ak, Depid tɨkek tɨk dad amɨl apɨl gɨl, tɨkɨnɨgabal Depid man ne Betlehem agak agɨlak. Pen bɨ anɨb awl, ne Galili plopens nɨb owup ak nɨm, ne Bɨ God nop aglup ak mel agɨlak.
